com.github.curriculeon.greeps

Class Counter

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • com.github.curriculeon.greeps.Counter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Timer

    public class Counter
extends greenfoot.Actor
    Counter that displays an (optional) text and a number.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static float FONT_SIZE 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Counter()
      Create a counter without text.
      Counter(java.lang.String prefix)
      Create a counter with prefix text, and 0 value.
      Counter(java.lang.String prefix, int value)
      Create a counter with prefix text and value.
